alert.note: Alert for Bitterroot, Sapphire Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 31 at 12:39PM MST until February 01 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MST /11 PM PST/ TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches, with isolated higher amounts. Localized snowbands will greatly reduce visibility and create quickly changing road conditions. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Dixie, Elk City, Highway 12 Lowell to Lolo Pass, Highway 93 Sula to Lost Trail Pass, and Lolo Pass. * WHEN...Until midnight MST /11 PM PST/ tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
